name: reshow
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to show a television programme or film again : The documentary is being reshown in five feature-length episodes, starting tonight. They've been very successful showing and re-showing episodes of "Friends".
More examplesFewer examplesHe asked the TV show's editors to dub over the mistake when the programme was reshown on Saturday.The actors' union is currently striking over pay for commercials that are reshown on streaming services.The BBC is reshowing the entire 32-episode drama over the next few months.
